name: Google Slides
description: Create and manage Google Slides presentations - view slides, extract text, add and remove slides
author: PalmClaw Team

tools.name: slides_get
tools.description: Get full presentation details of a Google Slides presentation by its ID. Returns the title, number of slides, and the object ID of each slide.

tools.name: slides_create
tools.description: Create a new Google Slides presentation with the given title. Returns the new presentation's ID and URL.

tools.name: slides_list_slides
tools.description: List all slides in a Google Slides presentation. Returns an array of slide summaries with objectId and pageType for each slide.

tools.name: slides_get_slide_text
tools.description: Extract all text content from a specific slide by its 0-based index. Walks all page elements and collects text from shapes and text boxes.

slide_index.description: 0-based index of the slide to extract text from

tools.name: slides_add_slide
tools.description: Add a new slide to a Google Slides presentation. Supports specifying a layout (BLANK, TITLE, TITLE_AND_BODY, etc.) and optional insertion index.

layout.description: Predefined layout for the new slide: BLANK, TITLE, TITLE_AND_BODY, TITLE_AND_TWO_COLUMNS, TITLE_ONLY, SECTION_HEADER, etc. (default: BLANK)

insert_at.description: 0-based index at which to insert the new slide (optional, appends at end if omitted)

tools.name: slides_delete_slide
tools.description: Delete a slide from a Google Slides presentation by its object ID. Use slides_list_slides to find slide object IDs.

slide_id.description: The objectId of the slide to delete (use slides_list_slides to find IDs)
